citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:46am on
10/12/2021. We called the licensee who said a person that can accompany inspectors was away and couldn't be back
until late afternoon. We discussed optimal hours of inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:46am on 
10/12/2021.  We called the licensee who said a person that can accompany inspectors was away and couldn't be back 
until late afternoon.  We discussed optimal hours of inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
